overview: Janson Holloway is desperate to save his marriage and takes a higher-paying job as manager of a manufacturing plant in Hampton, Va. One night, he is out jogging while wearing a festive hat with a mask to protect his face from the nippy air, and helps a rookie police officer catch two suspects. The press dub Holloway the "Mardi Gras Man," and he transforms into a kind of vigilante.
tagline: Gentleman by Day. Unlikely Hero by Night
title: The Mardi Gras Man
